msbt.message: If there's one thing I know nothing about, it's having a limit to how much I can lift. It sounds kinda fun! What's it like? The way you left that thing behind was like...whoa! Oh, and by the way, here it is.

Usually I only send packages so the mail folks can have ultra-heavy stuff to lift. But this time I sent that thing you couldn't take with you the other day, which is only KINDA heavy. I hope they still liked it.

It was fun hanging out with you the other day. Oh! Remember the thing I couldn't give you 'cause your pockets were full? Here it is. Also, I might've done biceps curls with it, so I hope it wasn't fragile!
